name: Mautic Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Mautic Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Mautic API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Mautic API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: credentials

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact
available_options: Campaign Contact (值: campaignContact) - Add/remove contacts to/from a campaign
Company (值: company) - Create or modify a company
Company Contact (值: companyContact) - Add/remove contacts to/from a company
Contact Segment (值: contactSegment) - Add/remove contacts to/from a segment
Segment Email (值: segmentEmail) - Send an email

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the company to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company Name | 作用: The name of the company to create

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: comments (值: None) - A text describing details of Do Not Contact entry

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company ID | 作用: The ID of the company

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFieldsUi (值: None) - Adds a custom fields to set also values which have not been predefined
email (值: None) - Email address of the contact
ipAddress (值: None) - IP address to associate with the contact
ownerId (值: None) - ID of a Mautic user to assign this contact to
company (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stage (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
ipAddress (值: None) - IP address to associate with the contact

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 30

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address of the contact

company.name: company
company.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
company.natural_language_description: 参数名: Primary Company Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

bodyJson.name: bodyJson
bodyJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: Contact parameters

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: The ID of the contact

action.name: action
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 默认值: add

channel.name: channel
channel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 默认值: email | (必填项)

points.name: points
points.natural_language_description: 参数名: Points | 默认值: 0

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: search (值: None) - String or search command to filter entities by
orderBy (值: None) - Column to sort by. Can use any column listed in the response.
orderByDir (值: None) - Sort direction: ASC or DESC
publishedOnly (值: None) - Whether to return currently published entities
minimal (值: None) - Whether to return array of entities without additional lists in it
rawData (值: None) - By default only the data of the fields get returned. If this options gets set the RAW response with all data gets returned.

campaignEmailId.name: campaignEmailId
campaignEmailId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
campaignEmailId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Email Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

segmentId.name: segmentId
segmentId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
segmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Segment Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

segmentEmailId.name: segmentEmailId
segmentEmailId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
segmentEmailId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Segment Email Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)
